name: Data Analyst / Data Scientist / Report Developer
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Close collaboration with the BMW national sales company (NSC) business units to gain an understanding of required reports.
  • Translate business needs to data and reporting requirements.
  • Responsible for creation and further development of market data analysis and respective reports as per the business requirements.
  • Ensure delivery of new functionality to business departments as a new development for central or local projects or through functional maintenance of existing applications.
  • Develop SQL, T-SQL scripts and SQL stored procedures for various reporting and data development projects following the BMW IT software development guidelines and software design standards in an Agile software development environment.
  • Design and develop advanced reporting solutions with MS SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and QlikView/Qlik Sense Business Analytics Software by using multiple data sources.
  • Create, modify and maintain SQL queries, stored procedures and jobs.

Desired skills and competencies:

  • Magister or equivalent degree in IT or Mathematics
  • 6+ years work experience in the area of sales & marketing and/or finance management data analytics.
  • Advanced experience in data analytics, data visualization, reports development and automation for Qlik based data analytics solutions.
  • Expert knowledge of software development programming languages such as SQL, Python and C#.
  • Advanced knowledge of MS Excel, esp. the usage of formulas, macros and pivot tables.
  • Good knowledge of Agile software development processes and practice with Agile tools such as Jira, Confluence, Xray and Jenkins.
  • Good Knowledge about ITIL IT Service Management processes like Incident, Problem and Change Management.
  • Advanced communication skills.
  • Advanced English language skills.
